import axios from'axios';var baseProjectService=axios.create({baseURL:'/api/project'});var getAllprojects=function getAllprojects(){return baseProjectService.get('/list').then(function(result){var projects=result.data.projects;return Promise.resolve(projects);}).catch(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});};var getProjectById=function getProjectById(id){return baseProjectService.get("/".concat(id)).then(function(result){var project=result.data.project;return Promise.resolve(project);}).catch(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});};var deleteProjectById=function deleteProjectById(id){return baseProjectService.get("/".concat(id,"/delete")).then(function(result){//const project = result.data.project;
return Promise.resolve('Cause was Deleted');}).catch(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});};var updateProject=function updateProject(body){console.log(body);var form=new FormData();form.append('title',body.title);form.append('shortDescription',body.shortDescription);form.append('location',body.location);form.append('category',body.category);if(body.coverPictureUrl!==null)form.append('coverPictureUrl',body.coverPictureUrl);return baseProjectService.post("/".concat(body.id,"/edit"),form).then(function(result){var project=result.data.project;return Promise.resolve(project);}).catch(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});};var getProjectByCategory=function getProjectByCategory(category){return baseProjectService.get("/category/".concat(category)).then(function(result){var projects=result.data.projects;return Promise.resolve(projects);}).catch(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});};var createProject=function createProject(data){console.log(data);var form=new FormData();form.append('title',data.title);form.append('description',data.description);form.append('category',data.category);form.append('money',data.money);form.append('resources',JSON.stringify(data.resources));form.append('volunteer',JSON.stringify(data.volunteer));form.append('location',data.location);form.append('coverPictureUrl',data.coverPictureUrl);console.log('create client',data);return baseProjectService.post('/create',form).then(function(result){}).catch(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});};export{createProject,getAllprojects,getProjectByCategory,getProjectById,updateProject,deleteProjectById};
